title: Thai-style Chili, Lime, and Cilantro Dipping Sauce Recipe
full_text:
Thai-style Chili, Lime, and Cilantro Dipping Sauce Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
8 servings
Makes
1 cup
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
cloves
garlic
, grated on a microplane grater
1/2
cup
fish sauce
1/2
cup
lime juice
1/2
cup
brown sugar
2 to 4
red Thai
chiles
, finely minced (or
2
teaspoons
Sambal Oelek
crushed fresh chile sauce)
1/4
cup
finely
minced cilantro
1/4
cup
finely sliced
scallions
Directions
Whisk all ingredients together in a medium bowl. Serve with fried chicken.
